#labels Featured
=Configuration=

Configuration provided by xml config.
Default config placed inside scheme2ddl.jar. But you can provide option
{{{--config <path_to_your_custom_config>}}}

Sample config placed in distribution package.

==What can be configured==

|| **name** ||  **details** ||
|| dataSource || connecttion string to oracle ||
|| reader || try to process Public Db Links and Dmbs Jobs ||
|| writer || output path || 
|| taskExecutor || number of thread ||
|| transformParams_for_dbms_metadata || ||
|| ddlFormatter || some prettify options ||
|| dependencies || for example, index is dependency for table ||
|| excludes || patterns to exclude proccessing ||
